alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 9:26PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony is forecast to rise above flood stage Sunday afternoon. However, it`s not expected to crest until the middle of March. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 18.6 feet Sunday, March 12. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
